abstrac: High-end photography and related services for advertising, marketing and corporate communications.
bio:
The digital revolution has brought about changes in photography, but a professional, schooled in the fundamentals, with years of experience, will take a better digital picture for you.

I inherited the photography bug from my father, who was versatile in many of the arts. From him, I learned the science and magic of the darkroom – out of those careful confines, bringing into the light a beautiful photograph. I also learned sculpture under his guidance which continues to inform every digital photograph I take.

Sculpture taught me the importance of dimension, choosing the optimum angle, understanding on an instinctual level how the light falling on an object will define it in the photograph. Jewelry photography is one of my specialties. In a very real sense, jewelry is sculpture on a small scale. But these considerations come strongly into play in all product photography.

When photographers were still shooting film, more of them thought about the lighting, composition and end usage that was necessary before releasing the shutter. For a photographer like me, with traditional training, that thinking is still there. Which means I’ll get it right for you the first time. This is something very important in a professional setting where cost and deadline are paramount.

Of course, I also photograph people. People are unique photographic subjects where attitude matters. Producing the right head shot is an art which I’m proud to say I have mastered.

I’m looking to connect with jewelers, and with art directors at agencies and corporations who appreciate the difference between the average photographer and one with the background to achieve your vision.

It’s who’s behind the camera that matters.

Message me on the CONTACT page, call me at 847-275-3936, or write to me at wagnerphoto@comcast.net. I want to take your pictures. Book your session today.
I can work by the shot or by the day.  Let me know what works for you.

abstrac: Seeing through your eyes is how we help you grow your company
bio:
Let EDK find your company’s voice. Whether you’re just starting your business or ready to take it to the next level, our specialized full service boutique marketing services can help shape the image and identity of your brand.

EDK & Company, based in Los Angeles, is a boutique lifestyle marketing agency specializing in marketing communications, public relations, graphic design, creative content development, and social media marketing services. From consumer goods to construction, we work across a wide number of industries.

Endrea Kosven, founder and executive director, studied at the USC School of Journalism and the Fashion Institute of Design & Merchandising in Los Angeles. Endrea has worked for many media outlets and companies, broadening her exposure to different styles and audiences. She has worked at the news departments at MTV and KCAL-9 Los Angeles, and performed promotional and public relations work for KYSR 98.7 FM Los Angeles and the Los Angeles Dodgers.

bio:
I am a passionate freelancer. I am owning a number of skills. My professional and personal experience enables me to approach my work with an understanding and considered style. If you require website content, blog articles, copywriting, or creative writing on almost any subject, I am happy to work together on a long-term basis and have continued to collaborate with many of my clients for a number of years. Much of my work includes the use of common SEO techniques, so if that is a requirement for your project, I am comfortable including it within the content.

A little information on how I work:

- I am professional and polite and hope people will respond in kind.
- All projects must be completed via Upwork.
- Please be clear on the scale of the project and the required deadlines. If the scope increases, we will have to renegotiate on price before completion.
- Communication is key! I always respond quickly to messages and am happy to answer any questions you may have, and I hope you are too.
- I have no problem offering a reasonable amount of revisions for free but will charge extra for high demands.
 I am a graphic designer dealing with all kinds of graphic tasks. I am a writer as well with 15 years of experience. Being MS Office certified, I am teaching at an international institute. I am best at virtual assistance due to my divergent expertise.
Open to all offer, 100% satisfaction is my guarantee

bio:
I’m a web developer who spends most of my whole day experimenting with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, WordPress, Magento, OpenCart and Shopify. I also try to get to the roots of PHP while inhaling a wide variety of information through RSS feeds to learn more and implement even more. My goal is to build websites and application UI that delights, informs, and facilitates.

I’m a curious lad who enjoys a challenge and an opportunity to learn something new everyday. I do my best to stay on top of changes in my niche so that I can meet newer challenges and demands with the right tools, right strategy, and right approach for the job at hand.
